website_summaries.verdict: A great gift for anyone who loves Woody from Toy Story and wants a realistic toy similar to the movie.
pros: Pull the string on Woody's back and hear him say 19 different phrases
Comes with a hat that can be taken off and on and is made of soft materials so younger kids can play with him, too
cons: Some buyers had issues with the pull string after some time

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed but my son isn’t.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few concerns that makes me question if this is actually the signature collection or not. To start he’s a little cockeyed. I hadn’t really noticed it until I took a picture of him. The stitching on his legs is not straight at all. His arms are sewed on two different ways and his hat is misshapen. I probably won’t request a return because my son is already very attached to him. Just slightly disappointed in the detail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect Birthday gift for my son after watching all three movies- We also got buzz. They look exactly perfect with voices. Buzz has all the functionality as the movie character.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. This was the one toy that my Daughter had been asking for months for her 5th Birthday. She opened it up and... nothing, just an electronic sound coming from it, no voice. Ran over to the store thinking a new battery would help, but it didn't. I had to return it and buy the Disney version from a local store, thankfully she was not too upset about the whole situation.
customer_reviews.author: TamTam

customer_reviews.title: 6 Phrases NOT 19, Disney Parks Version
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this exact doll advertised for my daughter's birthday. Fast forward 2 years and lots of love later and we are in desperate need of a replacement. What we received is NOT the doll advertised. We received the Disney Parks Version. It plays 6 phrases, not the advertised 19 in the product description. It looks and feels cheaply made, the stuffing is bulging in random places, and the colors are off. I am so disappointed by the inaccuracy of the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: The pull string doesn't work on most days
customer_reviews.text: Ok well I was worried with reviews but it looked good a my son loves toy story. Bought it and it arrived with its nose scuffed and they did a replacement but sure enough like others mentioned the pull strong only worked for a day. I taught and watched my son only pull it carefully too so it wasn't from a kid being rough it literally is not made well. However it did start working again on another day and has continued to work on some days and then not for a few days. It's cute but not reliable for talking and has a strong hanging out on the leg too.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Bad toy, dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 and returned it because the string did not work correctly and was hanging all the way out when we got it. I ordered another. Pull string does not work correctly on this one either. The first time we pulled on it it came all the way our. My son was very upset. Sending this one back to. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have ordered. The first the string wouldn't retract so I returned it and ordered another one. This one worked FOR LESS THAN 8 hours. Sadly I ordered it a month ago so I am over my 30 day return period. My son still loves it and I am sure it will get a lot of play without the voice and it looks well made, still very dissapointed. You can remove the pull string and there appears to be a battery compartment. So I will try replacing batteries and see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: McFischer Family

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely junk I read up on it sounded like a good buy well the voice ain't even tom Hanks and it has none of the original sayings my daughter every time she sees woody she says reach for the sky it doesn't say that or there's a snake in my boot or anything just a bunch of stupid sayings from toy story 4 update well the arm is ripping already and it was barely played with today it's completely junk cheap product at a premium price
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been obsessed with Toy Story and the signature classic toys at Target but I couldn't stomach $90 for a toy. Wishing I'd spent the little extra because, while this one is nice looking, it says none of the Woody phrases only quotes from TS4 and she hasn't seen that yet. It is throwing her off and making me super twitchy. Nice doll, feels decent quality, just frustrated they chose to go with movie quotes instead of what Woody's supposed to say.
customer_reviews.author: SarahE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: So while this product is great in so many ways... HIS LEG RIPPED! More than once the stitching came undone. Super upsetting! I sewed the first rip, then right above it, it ripped again. And it wasn't from rough play as my son is very cautious and takes extreme care with his Woody (regardless it shouldn't rip open at all). Haven't been so bummed about a toy in a while as my son loves it and just wish the quality was better
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT say the right phrases!
customer_reviews.text: You should know this before buying! When you pull the string, this Woody toy says phrases that the CHARACTER says in TOY STORY FOUR. It does NOT say the phrases that the actual pull toy would say when, say, Andy or Bonnie pulled his string. !!! (My son keeps pulling the string and waiting for the toy to say "There's a snake in my boot!", "Hey Howdy Hey", or "Someone's poisoned the water hole!" Instead it says phrases that the CHARACTER Woody says in Toy Story FOUR, e.g., "This is forky!"
customer_reviews.author: S. Madsen

customer_reviews.title: We buy a new one yearly
customer_reviews.text: I can't really explain the love that my son has of these Woody dolls. It seems like we have to replace him yearly. I have a Special Needs son who can be a bit rough on Woody but he loves him so. Even after falling apart, you can still pull his string and he still talks. We often times feel guilt because we have seen Toy Story and feel like our son is killing Woody over and over again. We just have to tell ourselves that his spirit transfers to the new doll when the old one dies. :D we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emma78

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried due to the reviews, my son's toy came perfectly, it has no problem with the eyes and the toy looks amazing, it shows like the original thing. Now, don't know if someone will care but I actually got Woody from Bonnie, so it has the pink neckpiece and it says "Bonnie" on the boot. Thankfully my kid is not old enough to care but an older kid might. Other than that, it is Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Bother
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. We gave this to my son on Sept. 22nd for his 3rd birthday and it’s already broken by October 3rd. Today when I pull the string it sticks on the way back in, and Woody no longer talks. It might be a blessing because all he talks about is forkin’ Forky. Like, WHO CARES. My kid is newly obsessed with Toy Story and he was so excited to hear “Reach for the skyyyyy” or “There’s a snake in my boots!” but this Woody does not say any phrases from the original movie. 1/10 do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lev

customer_reviews.title: Would not hgt ave bought if it weren't for the misinformation
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited after recieving this and after much research and reading answers from other buyers I decided to buy.. dont do it. Total waste of money it looks exactly as it should but people were saying it says theres a snake in my boots, etc and all it says is stuff about forky. Regardless to say this will be going straight back. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMomma

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this Woody. He seemed very flimsy and cheap. His badge was hooked to his vest with what looks like an earring back. His hat doesn't stay on, it is too big. His sayings are very fast and short, and in our Woody's case his pull string would not retract all the way in. After much debate, I returned him. My son did seem to like him, as we are big Toy Story fans, but I just couldn't justify the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Talking Woody
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson got it for his 3rd birthday. Other than his hat doesn't stay on very well and the voice doesn't really sound like Tom Hanks, it's perfect. He loves it. I had to go and order Bullseye just so Woody would be complete. (He had all ready received Buzz for Xmas. It was so hard waiting till March to give him Woody)
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: May be a knock off
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and ordered this but like some of the other reviews the doll came with the string half out and the sound was garbled. The skin color did seem a bit dark like others described with it looking like woodys lips were brown. Sending it back and going to the Disney Store. Just received the Disney Store version...the quality IS much better...the string was where its supposed to be and the voice sounds just like the Woody character in the movie...the skin and lip color is nicer as well...
customer_reviews.author: Nona O'D

customer_reviews.title: Seam split on day 1
customer_reviews.text: Woody does not sound like "Woody" from toy story since it isn't Tom Hanks. Hat fits poorly and won't stay on head. Worst, seam in leg split open after a very gentle amount of handling on 1st day. I really really really hate going to the post office & have very limited free time so the hassle of a return sounds very un-appealing, but I'm not very skilled at sewing, and object to having to repair a brand-new toy that wasn't "cheap"
customer_reviews.author: christa thompson

customer_reviews.title: Reach for the sky!
customer_reviews.text: It says “there’s a snake in my boot” what else do you need to know? Also you can ask “want to see my 16 inch woody?” Then text people a picture of this toy. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tighthead

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived in perfect condition. I was pleasantly surprised by it's size ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in perfect condition. I was pleasantly surprised by it's size - a little bigger than I though. This is a present for my son but I am pretty sure he will love it when he opens it at the end of the month. I tried the pull string since many reviews made a big deal about voice - I thought it sounded enough like the Woody character and pretty much spot on to how the doll sounded when his string was pulled - so not sure what the big deal is about. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Seales

customer_reviews.title: This thing is bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I know what 16" measures but it really looks bigger than I pictured. However, that's fine. Its the real deal. Looks exactly like the movie one. My son has a few medical issues and special needs and all he wants for Christmas is a pull string Woody doll like in Toy Story. This is going to make his day. The string works well. Will update if I find any flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for movie fans
customer_reviews.text: The hat doesn't stay on, we put it in a drawer, but my son loves it! Has to have Woody at bedtime every night. Good size and quality. Has some great phrases from the films like, "there's a snake in my boot" or "you're my favorite deputy" but also has some random stuff "I'm part of the roundup gang with jesse, bullseye, and stinky Pete." OK? Did they run out of stuff to say? My son doesn't notice though and loves this toy all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H

customer_reviews.title: Not Hanks
customer_reviews.text: No where near as nice as Buz. Nice physical quality/features. But unlike Buz, the doll does not have the voice from the movie as you would expect - NOT Tom Hanks. Also unlike Buz, though he says a few phrases from the movie, most seem made up or something they implied Woody might say. I dont recall hearing these things in the movies and there are plenty of Woody catch phrases that were missed and coud have been used that were not. So seems like a knock off and is a dissalpointment. With that said, my son does not seem to notice and is very happy dragging floppy Woody around.
customer_reviews.author: ahaynes

customer_reviews.title: He seems just like the Woody in the movie
customer_reviews.text: My two year old son is obsessed with Toy Story so I bought this for him for his birthday. He has not let him out of his site yet! He has "Andy" written on the bottom of his boot and says the same things that are said in the movie when you pull his string. I was so pleasantly surprised by the quality of this doll. He seems just like the Woody in the movie. My only small complaint is that his hat is extremely hard to keep on his head which can upset my toddler at times. Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: The Smith Family

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for kids who love Woody
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like this Woody doll. My older son could tell it wasn’t Woody’s voice but he didn’t care. We thought it had stopped working, but we just readjusted the battery and haven’t had a problem since. The battery compartment is in Woody’s back.
customer_reviews.author: Megz

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: My son waited 2 months for this doll for his birthday. Within a week his boot fell off (I tried hot gluing it back on, it ended up falling off again in a week), the pull string doesn't wind back in and his scarf fell off and we can't find it. He's so disappointed, unlike Sid, my son really takes good care of his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a quality Woody but it doesn’t say all the classic saying like “Howdy Partner”, “You’re my favorite deputy”, “Reach for the sky”, and “there’s a snake in my boot”. They are Toy Story 4 sayings that aren’t memorable. Much like the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Pink bandana and Bonnie on boot bottom
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box looks great. Because this is a Toy Story 4 Woody doll there is a pink bandana instead of a red bandana and there is no Andy at the bottom of the boot rather there is a Bonnie! YIKES - not okay for my grandson- so we DYI’d Woody!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Holla

customer_reviews.title: A Child’s Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: My son was super excited to get this Woody doll for his birthday. However, he was soon extremely disappointed that it didn’t say the famous lines Woody says when you pull the string on the movies. Instead, it says lines from Toy Story 4. I knew this when I ordered it, but I had no idea just how disappointed my son would actually be. Don’t buy this for your kid unless you want to see them disappointed. I have regrets
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Nikokiris

customer_reviews.title: not a scrawny Woody doll
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after ours stopped talking (not dead batteries). I was disappointed with this. This Woody is fat, not like Woody is supposed to be. This did get played with less from my boys than the original we had. We've gotten rid of this shortly after getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Within one week of receiving, his boot came off, his vest on one side keeps sliding off, the handkerchief around his neck came off, and there are strings coming out all over the arms! My oldest son had the same woody and it lasted for almost 6 years. We bought this one as a replacement for my youngest and it even looks cheaper than the other one which is supposed to be the exact same thing. Very disappointmented waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Good classic toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son 3 years ago, and which years of play (plus an additional brother playing along), I must say this has held up pretty well. we love tis toy. It's a good size, I like the facial features, the sounds work. And I like that the body is soft enough to be hugged or slept with. The only thing I don't really like is that the doesn't really stay on. But that's no biggie for me. Good classic toy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality toy. Looks just like the movie character. It comes with a removable, plastic hat. The pull string plays several different sayings and doesn't require batteries. The boots are large enough that my son was able to write his own name on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Beast

customer_reviews.title: It accurately emulates the Woody people love from the films and I'm suprised by its durability ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my two year old son who loves Toy Story. He was enthralled and didn't care about opening any other presents. His father and myself grew up with Toy Story and the numerous toys that followed the movies' popularity. This one by far exceeds those previous toys we had (which is saying something today). It accurately emulates the Woody people love from the films and I'm suprised by its durability in the hands of my two year old. It was also, I thought, a pretty fair price. I'd recommend it for any child that loves Toy Story.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: If my husband and I would be in a better finical state we would have gotten the true Woody
customer_reviews.text: If my husband and I would be in a better finical state we would have gotten the true Woody. This is not true to the movie, not that a little kid would know. But my son wanted to know right away "Mommy why woody wear lip stick." Why that choice of lips I'm not sure. Cheaply made. and the string does not go all the way in, I'm not sure if that is right or not. My son likes it, i guess that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: This doll is great, it's like having the real Woody
customer_reviews.text: This doll is great, it's like having the real Woody! Cons: hat never stays on his head and has no string to hang around his neck, and his clothing doesn't line up perfectly in the back causing the pull string to not always retract fully, or retract slowly. Pros: good quality, sounds and looks just like the character
customer_reviews.author: Carly D.

customer_reviews.title: The voice is not the same as in the movie!!!
customer_reviews.text: The voice is not the original as in the movie, and it is very quiet. This was a gift for my 3 year old grandson and he was very disappointed. The return window is closed so I can't return it... very upset as he loves Toy Story..! I would have purchased a different one, but I figured Disney would have been the best...
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!  Spend your money on the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: This doll looks horrible. The legs and arms on the one I got are really really short. The knee bends are practically in the boot. The lips are brown and the eyes are strange to say the least. I don't believe for a second this is an actual Disney product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Somebody poisoned the water hole!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order from this seller because this doll has the pull string like Woody does in the movie. My kids are very observant and would feel wronged if it only had the button. Furthermore, the voice sounds exactly like Tom Hanks and the kids really enjoy that!
customer_reviews.author: Kelleynewton92

customer_reviews.title: Came as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! Just received today and checked over the item just based of previous reviews. It seems fine and seems to be working. Not taking him out of the box since it’s for Christmas for my son. Hopefully we have no issues. I would recommend only complaint is the item was a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I did like that he had the classic sayings such as "There's a snake in my boot" however his eyes look off to the side and his smile isn't like how it is in the movies. His bandana is pink instead of red and his vest almost seems too small to fit on him. The one plus is that my 7 year old recognizes that it's Woody and loves him but so not worth what we paid. We found an even better one at Target for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Woody, just like in the movie itself!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a Woody doll that looks EXACTLY like he does in the movie, then go no further! The detail is impeccable, right down to the ANDY on the sole of his shoe. He is a great size, and my nephew absolutely is obsessed with him. Great Christmas, bday, New Years, ANY kind of celebration really - gift. You can even pull at the back, and he has tons of different phrases. I love him!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: ... Toy Story as much as mine you won’t be disappointed. It’s the size Woody is in the movies ...
customer_reviews.text: If your child loves Toy Story as much as mine you won’t be disappointed. It’s the size Woody is in the movies and the details are on point. My son loves pulling the cord and hearing Woody talk to him (2yrold) he has the other characters as well and we go on Toy Adventures everyday. Oh and the Hat is an Accessory that is a soft plastic. Good for rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: broke twice in less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: First Woody was replaced quickly and easily, but now he broke again just outside of the three months from when I originally ordered him; each of two Woody dolls only lasted about two months, with very gentle, normal play from a 5 year old, not a baby. Not sure what the problem is but the pull-string/voice box seems to be low-quality.
customer_reviews.author: xhunei

customer_reviews.title: "Poison in the waterhole" got his voice
customer_reviews.text: Woody's pull string stopped working after 10 minutes even after changing batterys hes still mute ...the "snake in his boots" must have got him. Wish I had my 40 bucks back ....
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lawrensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this for my nephews I was hoping that it would stand the test of two toddlers and it DID! This poor toy had been thrown, dropped, picked up by a dog, shaken tirelessly, and then some. The only downfall/con of this toy is the hat not staying on Woody. The two pieces became separated and lost, every once in a while we will find the hat in a weird place when cleaning. Having a toddler hold his woody doll while watching Toy Story makes up for it!
customer_reviews.author: Steph McKee

customer_reviews.title: Product Description is wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is the new Toy Story 4 Woody doll and through descriptions and box images it appears to be the older style. It was not what I was hoping for. It was a nice doll though just not what was described.
customer_reviews.author: OrangeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son opened this up and I realized that woody's lips were brown not pink and he had cotton coming out of his wrist, not happy with this and Amazon could not replace it so I have to return it and get another woody. He looks sun bleached I find it hard to believe that this is an authentic disney store toy
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Woody Curious George and Andy are back together again
customer_reviews.text: What little boy doesn't like his own personal friend and Woody look like that Fred that can entertain any boy and and the horse needed him back so they are reunited.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter is in love with Toy Story at the moment and really wanted this for her birthday. We were disappointed to find it's not really a pull string toy, it talks whether the string is pulled or not. And the string is really unreliable. After a couple of weeks with a kid who is crazy careful with her toys, the string no longer goes all the way back in. Six year old still loves it, but we're all a bit disappointed at the poor quality of the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Voice box broken on 2 different units
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these by mistake. The first one broke and wouldn't talk anymore after about a month. Then the second one stopped working about 3 days after I gave it to my son for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: kscruff

customer_reviews.title: The voice isn't that much different. Still great priced toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great replica from the movie. My 4 year old son loves being able to pull the string on the back. I do wish there was a better solution for the hat like a suction cup or velcro as it seems to have a slightly hard time staying on. It is hard plastic and you have to smush it pretty good on Woody's head to stay on for very long. The voice isn't Tom Hanks and is barely noticeable to normal fans. If your kid is obsessed with Toy Story you might be better off spending a bit more for the real voice...
customer_reviews.author: mattnwa

customer_reviews.title: Is a pull string. Only new sayings.
customer_reviews.text: He only says new sayings about forky & TS4 references. It is a pull-string doll. Plastic head, hands, boots, & soft body. Pull string whips in fast. Is a nice doll, about 14/15 inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Susana L

customer_reviews.title: They love it! They're huge fans of Buzz and Woody ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 3 year old twin boys. They love it! They're huge fans of Buzz and Woody and with this one, to be able to actually get him to talk by pulling the string is really cool! They carry this around with them everywhere and take him everywhere we go. They freak out when they misplace him. I would definitely recommend buying this for any child who is a fan of the Toy Story movies. Shipped right on time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Roney

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I should've listened to the other reviews... Woody arrived with his pullstring completely torn off. Also, he has black lines through his eyebrows and the color of his face is off, just like other people were saying. Steer clear of this. Getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: WA7S0N

customer_reviews.title: You've Got a Toy in Him
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. Looks better in person than the picture suggests. Looks exactly like Woody from the movies. Not only that, but the pull string phrases are loud and clear and are definitely Tom Hanks' lines from the movie isolated for the toy. It stands up to a beating, is stitched together well, and Woody's height is correct relative to the Buzz Lightyear and Jesse and Bullseye (plush) figures being sold on Amazon right now. The only flaw is the hat. It is a tough plastic that fits Woody but never stays on his head. Your kids will love it, if they love the movies. No doubt about it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: We had a festive Christmas morning with 2 Toy Story Talking Toys -- Woody & Buzz
customer_reviews.text: New in box, Toy Story Woody 16" Talking Figure. Yes, it is a Pull String toy, which had it's drawbacks for our 3+ year old grandson, but I hope he will grow into playing with Woody on his own. He did better with the companion (but purchased separately) toy, Toy Story Talking Buzz, which speaks or makes sounds when different areas are triggered on his person. Anyway, Woody is just like you see him in the movies, before he comes to life. You often find him collapsed on the floor in an awkward position! Grandma loved him!
customer_reviews.author: JoyS

customer_reviews.title: Looks great .. but doesn't work great!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and my toy story obsessed daughter was thrilled to open this at Christmas! I personally think it looks great! However.., it constantly talks! Not just when the string is pulled .. but EVERY time you touch it anywhere or it moves! Even my daughter has asked me to turn it off which you can not. Definitely think I got a broken one. She plays with her buzz and Jessie more because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherannski

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son. Within 3 days the pull string came out of the voice box and we cannot fix it. The seams on the side of the body have also started tearing apart. My kid LOVES his woody doll, carries him everywhere, and sleeps with him. These problems are not from "rough play". They are from crappy workmanship. And for almost $40, I'm angry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy
customer_reviews.text: BEST Kids Doll every ! its big ( length of my forearm ) soft body and hard hat and boots) my son will be opening for christmas - very worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Hancho

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disapointed with the way things are sold on here. I believe it should have been specified that the doll does not have the original voice (Tom Hanks) the toy's quality itself is horrible. Paint does not match in some areas. Like someone poorly trained painted it or something. Clothes on it are also not so good! Ive seen the same product at other retailers and you can totally see the difference! Oh well i learned my lesson the hard way. Never to waste my money on this site
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great price for this now classic doll.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I found this doll! It was on sale for half of what it normally costs so I knew I had to get it for my 3 year old. I was away from home and with Amazons amazing app I was able to quickly send him this gift so that he knew I was thinking about him. It is your average talking woody doll, This doll has a hat that comes with him. My son lost the hat really quickly. We have had it for around 5 months now and it is still a loved doll. It has held up to a lot of rough play quite well.
customer_reviews.author: mimiroo

customer_reviews.title: A good, solid toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our son really loves this Woody ...He doesn't sound exactly like Tom Hanks from the movies, but it's so close that our son couldn't tell. Really no complaints about this one other than that his hat doesn't stay on (you really can't even put it on) ...it should have come with a way to clip that hat on, because our Woody has never even worn it once out of the box. The pull string seems to be strong, though my son doesn't pull it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Not original sayings
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute doll. The only thing I didn't like is the sayings. I wish they would have add in some of the original Woody sayings.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lee Barrio

customer_reviews.title: Does say reach for the skies
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely disappointed after giving this as a present to our son. This woody has 12 phrases and they are all about forky. He doesn’t have any of the classic phrases, we are considering returning it for one that doesn’t just talk about forky.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: adorable toy
customer_reviews.text: my son loves his woody toy, i only gave it one less star because the doll had a white mark on his head i couldn't just wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Less phrases, hat fits poorly
customer_reviews.text: I got this doll for my nephew who loves Toy Story, he hasn’t opened the present yet but a few things I’ve noticed are there are only five sayings instead of the 19 that the description claims to have. Guess we can deal with that though. The hat is also pretty poor fitting and that becomes a problem with a toddler, might try glueing it on.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Ponton

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave no stars I would! Woody was delivered in visually perfect condition but he did not work! My husband and I ran out to replace his special batteries so we would have to return this item but sadly the toy is completely defective. The worst part is trying to get a replacement will take over a week as you have to complete a whole new order. My sweet special needs son was extremely devastated that his prize woody had to leave our house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wow Woody
customer_reviews.text: WOW this is the most amazing Woody. He looks just like the character in the movies. The pull string is so fun, he says several phrases. Our grandson loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Netnet67

customer_reviews.title: Cute Woody
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 3 1/2 yr old Grandson who loves Toy Story. The one I received looked good and sounded good. Hope it lasts for him.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Draw string bums me out
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 of these. The first one broke the day it was opened. The second one lasted a little longer but eventually the draw string gave out. It's adorable (hence the 2 stars) but really does NOT last! My son LOVES it but misses the voice. In fact, he's asked for another talking Sheriff Woody for Christmas this year. I can not believe it...but I may actually order a third knowing the stupid thing will break as soon as he opens it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old LOVES THIS! Update: Voice broke after one year.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described in the post. My son loves this. It's well made and sounds just like Woody. Some of the reviews stated that it was or wasn't Tom Hanks voice. It really doesn't matter to me because whomever's voice it is sounds just like the movie and that's all my 4 year old cares about. *Update: After about one year, the voice no longer works. There's no way to get the voicebox out to check the batteries. It's sewn in the doll. Disappointed it no longer talks, but they still like the doll.
customer_reviews.author: casey36

customer_reviews.title: Why so expensive for a Chinese knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this toy 2 stars because many 2 year old son really does enjoy it. The reason for the large amount from five stars had a lot to do with price vs quality. "Woody", who does not have Tom Hanks' voice, has legs with boots that always point to the right. Also, the doll does not say Disney on the tag. Being built correctly, with correct labeling is what I was expecting to receive when paying $40 in 2016.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: Decent deal
customer_reviews.text: I dont like that there isnt many phrases. I was in desperate need of a doll & I thought this was it. I wish I could've found one with many phrases
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: It's..but seems a bit fragile.
customer_reviews.text: The Woody doll itself is cute. It looks just like movie. But within a week the hand broke. I don't really know why the doll it so fragile, being that it is a child's play thing. My son was not unusually rough, so maybe the plastic is defective. And within a month the pull string no longer works. Now I haven't taken it apart to try and change a battery yet. Just thought it was weird for it to die that quickly. (Assuming it would work sheet the battery is changed)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Had to send back twice. Sent back the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back twice. Sent back the first one when the pull string came off after about 30 minutes of use. My 5-year-old was in tears. I had noticed that the string didn't retract very well but didn't think much about it. The next one also had a string that would not retract and went back without even coming out of the box. I will probably try again since my son loves Toy Story so much, but this load needs to go back on the boat!
customer_reviews.author: RayK

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable pull string
customer_reviews.text: The pull string fell off the first time my son pulled it. I like the size of it but now there’s no way for him to talk without the pull string
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied and Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Specifically wanted the doll that said the phrase. "There's a snake in my boot" DOESNT SAY IT, even though advertised in the reviews that it does. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: You got a friend in me
customer_reviews.text: Just like Andy had in the movie. There's others, but the pullstring Woody is movie authentic. He even has Andy written on the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Nick of the North

customer_reviews.title: Two months later and the voice box is Already broken
customer_reviews.text: Wow. My son got this for his birthday in August and it’s October and the voice box is already broken. My brothers original one from the 90s still works. But now I’m past the return date after 2 months! What a waste of $50
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gardner

customer_reviews.title: He’s got his mind on Forky and his Forky on his mind
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to get our son Woody for Christmas , we were surprised to find out that almost all his phrases had to do with Forky. There was no “there’s a snake in my boot”. As parents that grew up with the original Toy story we were disappointed but our boy that knows the newer movies loved it and that’s what matters.. right??
customer_reviews.author: Swood

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this Woody doll. The box it came in was damaged but that didn't bother me. Once my son opened it on Christmas I got a better look at the doll. The string was extended and wouldn't go back into woodys back. The stitching was done terribly!! It looks like they were in a huge hurry. The legs are stitched in different places and there are strings hanging off everywhere. The hat looks bent and won't stay on woodys head. And, the string came off after a few uses. Very disappointed. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Could be great with a few tweaks
customer_reviews.text: Now I understand how easily Woody would lose his hat in the films! This hat really does not like to stay on. My other issue is that the voice volume is quite low. He's hard to hear unless you are in a silent room. That being said, he is built just like you see him in the movies! He's my daughter's favorite character and she loves the toy!
customer_reviews.author: Aibanana

customer_reviews.title: Not How Woody Should Look
customer_reviews.text: This is the most disappointing Woody dollI've ever seen. The eyes are cocked, the lips are brown and his plastic parts are not hard plastic like the others I have seen. Glad I bought this early and my sister pointed these things out before I blindly wrapped it. I bought a "correct" Woody from Toys R' Us and am returning this one. The skin coloring is also darker than it should be. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Dotts

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an early Christmas gift. I always shop early. Too bad because now I can’t return the cheap toy that doesn’t even work. I tried purchasing the 8$ batteries and still no sound from the pull string. My and my 4 year old are disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jojobean

customer_reviews.title: Way over priced..
customer_reviews.text: For $50 you’d think it’d be a better product. The pull string voice isn’t Tom Hanks voice, it’s not even close. Plus the pull string lines aren’t even from the movies. Not a large toy. Well made for the most part. The price would be worth it for more like $20-$25. The only reason I’m not sending it back is because my kid doesn’t know these things and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Lammert

customer_reviews.title: He looks just like the one in the movie
customer_reviews.text: He looks just like the one in the movie. My son really likes him. His nose is sharp though so watch out if you are throwing him around.....
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Gift recipient likes. A bit expensive for what it is and what it does. Guess you pay a premium for the name .
customer_reviews.author: Bocker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Woody, just don't buy him when you also buy Buzz
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, super special toy. The only down side is that (exactly like the movie) Buzz outshines Woody in the coolness factor. It's not a fault of the toy, its just the way it is with these guys. I might recommend NOT buying Woody and Buzz at the same time, and your child will be 100% thrilled with this guy. Soft and well stitched, voices are great.
customer_reviews.author: S and R

customer_reviews.title: Woody, the Rootin' Tootin' Cowboy
customer_reviews.text: My son says: "I think that any kid that likes the Toy Story movies would love this doll. He has brought me lots of happiness, and we have had lots of fun. He even has "Andy" on his foot! He hasn't broken, is sturdy, and he has a real pull string. Unfortunately, he doesn't say "Someone has poisoned the waterhole!" which is my dad's favorite saying of Woody's. My only other complaint is that his hat is loose and that means I always have to worry about it getting lost. My mom is helping to make sure that doesn't happen."
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Well-loved for a year and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: This Woody is a perfect representation of the movie character! It was a 4th birthday gift for my son, to go along with the Buzz Lightyear he had gotten for Christmas. It's been almost a year, and Woody is still in great condition. He's been carried around, dropped, tossed, you name it. His voicebox and pullstring are still good, he's pretty easy to keep clean, and his face isn't all scratched up like some of the cheaper plastic doll toys get after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Sanchez Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Closest thing to the movie!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Its the closest thing to the movie that I have been able to find. The string thing was broken on the first one we bought and Amazon customer service made it right and the 2nd one was not defective. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a present for my sons birthday, it was literally ALL he asked for. When it arrived I was excited to hide it from him and give it to him when we celebrated. We even ran out late to purchase batteries. Well, Woody already does not talk when you pull his string. And now my son is really sad, plus I don't really have extra money to go buy him something reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for Toy Story fans
customer_reviews.text: This is a really neat toy. I've been looking at different ones to purchase, and have seen some that don't have an actual pullstring, you pull on it, and it makes noise, but the string is stationary. This is actually really neat in that the pull string works as you see in the movies. The hat doesn't stay on easily, but so far he's held up to my two rough kids for the last month. We'll see how long he lasts, but this was really worth buying. It's a good size, and so far very durable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality...Fingers broke off
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to say that this Woody is not Great or even good! He has several missing fingers that occured from regular play no rough play. Very disappointing. I am now on here looking for a new Woody that is more durable than this one.
customer_reviews.author: P. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Toy Story Woody
customer_reviews.text: Got Woodyfor my Granddaughter who will be 2yrs old this wkend and she loves Toy story. The doll is so cute and good size, withdraw string in his back just like the movie, really nice gift, she’s gonna love him.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Constancio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Woody!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Woody for my sons 3rd birthday party, as hes completely obsessed with Toy Story at the moment. My little boy is absolutely into details, so much he checked the bottom of Woody's foot when he got him out of the box to see if Andy was written. He absolutely loves him. Andy is on the bottom of the feet ( which is awesome! ) and he loves the sayings. I have a 3 year old Andy running around yelling "There's a snake in my boot!". It doesn't sound like the Woody in the movie but he could honestly care less. I would definitely buy this toy again.
customer_reviews.author: danelle

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt reccomend this particular Toy
customer_reviews.text: Barely says anything, broke fairly easily jacket was yellowish and too small. Nice size, nice hat, but also unlike any other I've purchased and seemed a bit like a great knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Not the Woody Not the Woody
customer_reviews.text: We have three girls with Woody dolls and my 2yr old son wanted one too so I ordered this one believing it was the same as the others. I WAS WRONG. This Woody is slightly bigger and has Andy written on bottom of foot. It only speaks very few phrases. It doesnt know when its hat is off like our other Woody dolls. Its not bad in quality at all but my 2yr old knows the difference. This is more of a collecter doll because it is good quality and not as entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: DJQQueen

product_meta.title: Toy Story Pull String Woody 16" Talking Figure - Disney Exclusive
product_meta.description: Brand new Pull-String Woody doll in its original packaging. Disney Store Authentic. Approx 16" Tall. Ages 3 and Up.
feature_bullets: Soft body construction; solid head and boots
Soft Body Construction, Solid Head and Boots, Detachable Cowboy Hat.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,880 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
